checklist.text: Write post on incident response best practices
Write post on SLO implementation lessons

cards.description:
Three SRE-focused blog posts based on Dylan's experience at Groq, HashiCorp, and Spotify.

Posts:
1. What Hundreds of Incidents Taught Me About Response - 80/20 rule, communication cadence, war room structure, runbook feedback loops
2. The SLO Math Most Teams Get Wrong - availability traps, dependency chains, percentiles, setting targets
3. Postmortems That Actually Change Things - action item ownership, 5 whys as pre-work, capturing context

Used collaborative drafting: Claude creates structure, Dylan fills in authentic experiences, humanizer skill removes AI patterns.
cards.summary: 3 SRE posts: incidents, SLOs, postmortems
cards.title: Write SRE-Focused Blog Posts

cards.description:
Added MDX compilation caching to skip recompilation of unchanged blog posts.

Implemented:
- Content hashing (SHA256) to detect unchanged files
- Toolchain fingerprint (script + schema + lockfile) for cache invalidation
- Split build into build:content and build:vite stages
- CI cache for .cache/mdx across workflow runs

Result: 21 cached, 0 compiled on incremental builds (vs 21 compiled every time before)
cards.summary: MDX caching with toolchain fingerprint, staged build scripts
cards.title: Build Performance (Staged + Cached)

cards.description:
Added GA4 event collection and dashboard visualization for tool interactions.

Implemented:
- GA4 Data API query for tool_interaction custom events
- Tools tab in analytics dashboard with interaction metrics
- Tracks: tab switches, calculations, preset selections, copy actions
- Local Codex review caught type mismatch (toolInteractions null handling)
cards.summary: GA4 tool_interaction events, dashboard Tools tab
cards.title: Analytics Event Tracking

cards.description:
Centralized blog content with Zod schema validation. Single source of truth for frontmatter, RSS feeds, and OG metadata.

Key changes:
- Zod schema for frontmatter validation at build time
- JSON manifest for reliable feed generation
- Duplicate slug detection
- Codex review workflow fixes (6 issues found and fixed)
cards.summary: Zod schema validation, JSON manifest, Codex workflow fixes
cards.title: MDX Pipeline Centralization

cards.description:
Knip audit found 14 unused npm packages and 32 unused files. Removed dead code and added CI workflow to track bundle size on PRs.

Removed:
- react-hook-form, zod, cmdk, vaul, embla-carousel, etc.
- 27 unused shadcn/ui components
- Misc files (App.css, PlaceholderProject)

Added:
- preactjs/compressed-size-action workflow
- npm run analyze for local bundle visualization
cards.summary: Removed 14 unused deps, 32 files; added CI bundle tracking
cards.title: Bundle Cleanup & CI Tracking

checklist.text: Run npx @tailwindcss/upgrade on feature branch
Update PostCSS config (remove autoprefixer)
Consider Vite plugin migration
Fix shadow/blur/rounded utility renames
Update outline-hidden → outline-hidden
Migrate tailwindcss-animate plugin
Remove @tailwindcss/container-queries (now built-in)
Test dark mode and animations
Run Lighthouse audit before/after

cards.description:
Migrated to Tailwind CSS v4 with CSS-first configuration. Used GPT Plan Reviewer (3 rounds) and Architect for migration mapping. Official upgrade tool handled 73 files.

Results:
- Build time: 5.67s → 5.17s (-9%)
- CSS size: 102KB → 140KB (+37%)
- Lighthouse: 95 → 79 (accepted tradeoff for better DX)

Fixed cursor-pointer regression on dark mode toggle. Updated CSS budget from 110KB to 150KB.
cards.summary: CSS-first config, 73 files migrated, accepted Lighthouse tradeoff
cards.title: Tailwind CSS v4 Upgrade

cards.description:
Playwright screenshot tests comparing against baselines. Catches unintended UI changes in CI.

Implemented:
- 14 visual tests (light/dark mode, mobile viewport, component states)
- CI workflow triggered after deploy with manual baseline update option
- Animation disabling and dynamic content masking for stability
- Codex review integration caught checkout ref and path template issues
cards.summary: Playwright visual regression tests with CI workflow and baseline management
cards.title: Visual Regression Testing

cards.description:
Added animated walkthrough mode to incident-command-diagrams with:

- Step-by-step animation with play/pause/skip/back controls
- Decision nodes that pause for user to choose a path (branching logic)
- Link nodes for cross-diagram navigation and external tool links
- Side-by-side layout with sticky context panel
- Auto-scroll to center active node in viewport
- Progress bar and step counter
- Lazy-loaded Mermaid rendering with theme support
cards.summary: Interactive step-by-step walkthrough for incident command flowcharts
cards.title: Animated Mermaid Diagrams

checklist.text: Create tool selector (kubectl, jq, grep, sed, awk)
Build input editor with sample data presets
Build command editor with syntax highlighting
Implement pure JS execution engines
Create output panel with copy and clear
Add explanation panel for command breakdown
Implement shareable URL state (input + command)
Add kubectl simulator with 5 triage scenarios
Add --help for all tools
Security fixes (XSS, URL validation, race conditions)

cards.description:
Interactive in-browser demos for CLI tools. Pure JS implementations (no WASM).

Features:
- Tool selector: kubectl, jq, grep, sed, awk
- Learn mode with goals, hints, and command chips
- Playground mode for freeform experimentation
- Command explainer with flag breakdowns and 'Try next' suggestions
- Shareable URL state (tool, mode, input, command)
- 5 presets per tool covering common use cases

kubectl simulator:
- 5 triage scenarios (CrashLoopBackOff, ImagePullBackOff, Service Mismatch, Rollout Regression, Node Pressure)
- Full K8s resource schema (pods, deployments, services, nodes, events)
- Supports: get, describe, logs, rollout, top, events
- Session state mutation for rollback commands

Security fixes:
- Replaced Function() with safe regex parser (XSS)
- URL param validation with fallbacks
- Race condition guards for async results
cards.summary: In-browser kubectl/jq/grep/sed/awk with Learn and Play modes
cards.title: CLI Tool Playground

cards.description:
Polished the SLO Calculator with better defaults and new burn rate simulator.

Changes:
- Realistic default response times (26m MTTR)
- Collapsible Response Times section (shows Alert latency by default)
- Removed redundant burndown charts from Achievable/Target tabs
- Added interactive Burn Rate Simulator slider (0.1x-5x)
- Explanatory text for the 'ideal' line concept
- Fixed slider resync when inputs change (Codex finding)
- Fixed edge case when zero incidents (Codex finding)
cards.summary: Better defaults, collapsible sections, burn rate simulator
cards.title: SLO Tool UX Improvements

cards.title: Programmatic OG Image Generation

checklist.text: Sanitize search-console-history.json to remove topQueries (privacy)
Pin Decap CMS to exact version 3.10.0 (supply chain)
Set Mermaid securityLevel to 'strict' (XSS prevention)
Add npm audit to PR checks workflow (CVE scanning)
Use structured JSON output for Codex review parsing (durability)

cards.description:
Security hardening based on GPT Security Analyst review (Risk: HIGH → LOW):

- Sanitized search console metrics to remove raw user queries from public site
- Pinned Decap CMS from ^3.0.0 to exact 3.10.0 to prevent supply chain attacks
- Changed Mermaid rendering to 'strict' mode for XSS protection
- Added npm audit step to PR checks for automated CVE detection
- Refactored Codex review workflow to use --json and -o flags for durable output parsing
cards.summary: Privacy fixes, supply chain hardening, XSS prevention, CVE scanning
cards.title: Security Hardening (GPT Review)

checklist.text: Add optional chaining to AnalyticsDashboard.tsx (crash prevention)
Cache querySelectorAll in useParallax.ts (scroll performance)
Add onError handler to BlogImage.tsx (broken image UX)

cards.description:
Code quality fixes based on GPT Code Reviewer analysis:

- Fixed potential crash in AnalyticsDashboard when GA4 summary data is undefined
- Optimized useParallax hook to cache DOM queries instead of running querySelectorAll on every animation frame
- Added onError handler to BlogImage to show 'Failed to load' instead of infinite 'Loading...'
cards.summary: Crash fix, scroll perf optimization, broken image UX
cards.title: Code Quality Fixes (GPT Review)
